bike.description: A6-SL alloy, custom-butted, semi-integrated tapered headset w/ 1.5" lower bearing, hydroformed top and down tube. Rear triangle: A6-SL alloy, custom-butted w/ sealed bearing pivots, low-leverage suspended rockers, FSR 100mm travel, 142mm dropout, post-style disc mount and replaceable hanger

components.description: Fox 32 FLOAT 29 Evolution CTD w/ 15mm thru axle, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
Shimano SLX, M675 hollow Tech II w/ integrated spindle, 38/24T
Shimano SLX, M676, high direct mount
Shimano Deore XT, M786 SGS Shadow plus, 10-speed
Shimano SLX M678 32H Center Lock disc hubs, Sun Inferno 25 rims
Schwalbe Nobby Nic, 29" x 2.25" folding, 67 tpi
Shimano SLX M675, hydraulic disc, 180mm/160mm rotor
Shimano SLX M675 hydraulic disc w/ Inspec
Oval M650, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 710mm wide, +/- 5mm rise
Oval M713, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval M600 w/ hollow CrMo rails
Oval M750, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
